block.p: American League LOS ANGELES ANGELS--Placed 2B Howie Kendrick on the 15-day DL. Optioned RHP Greg Jones to Salt Lake (PCL). SEATTLE MARINERS--Recalled RHP Sean Green from Tacoma (PCL). Optioned LHP Jake Woods to Tacoma. TEXAS RANGERS--Traded LHP Daniel Haigwood to the Boston Red Sox for RHP Scott Showmaker and cash.

National League COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed RHP Rodrigo Lopez on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of RHP Matt Herges from Colorado Springs (PCL). Designated RHP Brian Lawrence for assignment. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Recalled LHP Justin Hampson from Portland (PCL). Optioned RHP Mike Thompson to Portland.

DENVER BRONCOS--Agreed to terms with P Todd Sauerbrun on a one-year contract. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Signed G Jake Scott to a one-year contract. NEW ORLEANS SAINTS--Signed CB Jason David to an offer sheet.
COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Fired Doug MacLean, president and general manager.

COLUMBUS CREW--Signed M-F Guillermo Barros Schelotto to a two-year contract. HOUSTON DYNAMO--Traded D Kevin Goldthwaite and a 2008 first-round draft pick to Toronto FC for M Richard Mulrooney. RED BULLS--Traded D Marvell Wynne to Toronto FC for a partial allocation and a 2008 second-round draft pick.
